Maven Qubell Plugin

This plugin is used to perform basic operations on Qubell instances, including launch instance, execute workflow and destroy instance.

Goals Overview

  • qubell:launch-instance Updates app manifest and launches intance.
  • qubell:run-command Runs a custom workflow on given instance
  • qubell:destroy-instance Destroys given instance
  • qubell:test-connection Verifies connection settings

Usage

General instructions on how to use the Qubell Plugin can be found on the usage page. For better insight on functionality visit official Qubell API documentation page.
